Show HN: Release-notifier.com – Get notified of new releases from GitHub repos
text:
Hi everyone,

this is a very small project I did some time ago, because the existing tools like gitpunch didn't worked at that given time.

With my tool you are able to get notified by email or webhook (e.g. Rocket.chat) if a specific repository on github gets a new release.

It's a simple rails SaaS and without costs. TBH if many people are interested in the tool maybe there could be a fee in the future, but that's a story in the future and not for you "early adopters" :)

Have a nice day!

Ask HN: Can anyone help me find Hawk's 3D tutorial?
text:
Does anyone remember this old programming tutorial? It was hosted on something like Angelfire. A google search doesn't turn up anything and I don't know how else to find it.

It basically described how to program your own wireframe 3d engine. Very simple but nostalgic for me. I think it is at least 20-25 years old.
